item.description:
Meet in the Chinese restaurant across from the Davis T station. From there we will walk to to and around Fresh Pond, and then back again. This should be a 2 hour walk. Plenty of free parking in the area.

Fresh Pond Reservation conisists of 162 acres of open space surrounding and protecting the 155 acre Fresh Pond Reservoir. Fresh Pond Reservoir is part of the drinking water supply system for the City of Cambridge.

http://friendsoffresh...
item.name: Fresh Pond evening walk
